entry.title: MY RESUME
entry.content:
title: "Resume - Eashenraj A/L Nagarajan"
date: 2025-04-25
tags: [Resume, Portfolio]
categories: [Profile]

🧑‍💻 Eashenraj A/L Nagarajan

Computer Science (Software Engineering) Undergraduate
First-Year Student | Universiti Malaysia Terengganu
📍 Malaysia
✉️ [your.email@example.com] | 📎 GitHub: [yourusername] | 💼 LinkedIn: [yourname]

🎓 Education

Bachelor of Computer Science (Software Engineering)
Universiti Malaysia Terengganu
2024 – Present

  • Currently in Semester 2
  • Strong foundation in programming logic and discrete structures
  • Learning Java, with experience in object-oriented programming and UI development

Diploma in Information Technology
[Politeknik Metro Tasek Gelugor]
Completed with CGPA: 3.66

  • Final Year Project: Developed an Employee Management System
  • Internship: Built an IT Support Ticketing System

💻 Technical Skills

  • Languages: Java, HTML, CSS, SQL, Markdown, PHP, Pseudocode
  • Tools & Frameworks: NetBeans, Gridea
  • Concepts: Object-Oriented Programming, Software Design, Discrete Math
  • Soft Skills: Problem-solving, Analytical thinking, Fast learner, Consistent

🧪 Projects

1. Tetris Game (Discrete Structures)

  • Created a playable Tetris-style game to demonstrate mathematical and logical concepts
  • Applied modular design, state transitions, and user interaction handling

2. House Rental System (Java)

  • Designed a Java-based rental system with login, house listing, distance filter, and payment receipt module
  • Emphasized OOP design, GUI, and user flow logic

3. Employee Management System (Diploma FYP)

  • Developed a complete employee records management system
  • Features included CRUD operations, role management, and basic reporting

4. IT Support Ticketing System (Internship)

  • Built a web-based platform to log and track IT support tickets
  • Focused on user interface, ticket categorization, and status updates

🎯 Career Interests

  • Backend Development
  • Software Engineering
  • IT Systems & Support

📜 Languages

  • English (Fluent)
  • Malay
  • Tamil

Last updated: April 2025

entry.title: Hello Gridea
entry.summary:
👏 欢迎使用 Gridea ！
✍️ Gridea 一个静态博客写作客户端。你可以用它来记录你的生活、心情、知识、笔记、创意... ...
entry.content:
👏 欢迎使用 Gridea ！
✍️ Gridea 一个静态博客写作客户端。你可以用它来记录你的生活、心情、知识、笔记、创意... ...

Github
Gridea 主页
示例网站

特性👇

📝 你可以使用最酷的 Markdown 语法，进行快速创作

🌉 你可以给文章配上精美的封面图和在文章任意位置插入图片

🏷️ 你可以对文章进行标签分组

📋 你可以自定义菜单，甚至可以创建外部链接菜单

💻 你可以在 Windows，MacOS 或 Linux 设备上使用此客户端

🌎 你可以使用 𝖦𝗂𝗍𝗁𝗎𝖻 𝖯𝖺𝗀𝖾𝗌 或 Coding Pages 向世界展示，未来将支持更多平台

💬 你可以进行简单的配置，接入 Gitalk 或 DisqusJS 评论系统

🇬🇧 你可以使用中文简体或英语

🌁 你可以任意使用应用内默认主题或任意第三方主题，强大的主题自定义能力

🖥 你可以自定义源文件夹，利用 OneDrive、百度网盘、iCloud、Dropbox 等进行多设备同步

🌱 当然 Gridea 还很年轻，有很多不足，但请相信，它会不停向前 🏃

未来，它一定会成为你离不开的伙伴

尽情发挥你的才华吧！

😘 Enjoy~
